hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/31b813602095936aa1715e2d59f8233b.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{?} \text{ apples on Saturday}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{4} \text{ apples on Sunday }}\\
=&\pink{15} \text{ apples in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Lisa went apple picking. She picked some apples on Saturday and $4$ more on Sunday. She picked $15$ apples in total.

 **How many apples did Lisa pick on Saturday? **

[[☃ input-number 1]] apples
